game.name: Warriors of Thalyrion
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Choose your hero and fight against your friends in different 2D pixelart worlds . Collect more items than your opponent and fight him in close combat or with a ranged weapon.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Choose your hero and fight against your friends in different 2D pixelart worlds . Collect more items than your opponent and fight him in close combat or with a ranged weapon.
